description: Description of the error page that is displayed when a user does not have permission to accept or reject a feed invitation.
defaultMessage: Make sure you are a workspace admin to accept invitations. If not, ask the workspace admin for assistance.

description: Title of the error page that is displayed when a user does not have permission to accept or reject a feed invitation.
defaultMessage: You don't have access to this invitation

description: This is a fragment of text that appears after the name of a person and email address, like: '[[Bob Smith, bob@example.com]] has invited your organization to...'. The name appears above the text and this part of the sentence continues on the second row of text. The two messages combined should read like a grammatically correct sentence.
defaultMessage: has invited your organization to contribute to a Shared Feed

description: An error message that informs the user that they are not the administrator of this workspace and as such cannot perform any actions on this page.
defaultMessage: You are not the admin of this workspace. Please contact your workspace administrator if you think this is in error.

description: An informational message that appears if the user tries to accept an invitation that they have already accepted.
defaultMessage: You have already accepted this invitation.

description: Label for a button that the user presses to accept an invitation they have received to collaborate with another organization
Label for a button that the user presses to decline an invitation they have received to collaborate with another organization
Dialog description when a user declines an invitation, telling them who to contact if they change their mind and want another invitation.
defaultMessage: You will need to contact {creator} in order to rejoin.

description: Button label to confirm declining an invitation
Dialog title when a user is prompted to confirm that they wish to decline (reject) an invitation.
